Question: In August 2002, this person and his solo band joined Ozzfest, mainstage.
Hints: This person was also a guest DJ at WXRK "K-Rock" in New York during the Fourth of July Monster Metal Meltdown in 2005.
In September 2007, this person was kicked out of the MTV Video Music Awards ceremony after engaging in a fight with Kid Rock.
This person and Aero debuted as DJs on the mainstage at Ultra Music Festival during Winter Music Conference (WMC) in 2004.
